resources.string: During the next Management Phase, all newly purchased ships may immediately take one action at normal cost. Continue exploring.
During the next Revenue Phase, all players receive Profit as though all private technologies were Public Knowledge. Continue exploring.

Place this tile in the Galaxy Map. All Players may drop off up to two Customers each on this tile, placing them under a Corporation token. During every Revenue Phase, players will receive 1 Resource for each Customer they have dropped off on this tile. Do not continue exploring.
Planets with the Xeno-domestication icon produce one additional Asset during the next Revenue Phase. Continue exploring.
Asteroid fields are impassible until the end of the next Fleet Phase. Continue exploring.
Choose an unoccupied Gas Giant tile on the Galaxy Map and remove it from play. Continue exploring.

Warp Gate Technology, Hostile Takeover, and Mass Containment must all immediately be sold to Earth. If a player must sell a technology in this way, they receive double Resources for it. Continue exploring.

Place this tile in the Galaxy Map. All Players may drop off up to two Customers each on this tile, placing them under a Corporation token. During every Revenue Phase, players will receive 1 Resource for each Customer they have dropped off on this tile. Do not continue exploring.
